resources.string: Fayiro erimu erinnya lye limu eriwo dda
Tewali App ezuuliddwa kuggulawo fayiro eno
Okusazaamu ebintu ebiri wansi kijja kubiggyawo enkalakkalira ku kyuma kyo era tebisobola kuzuulibwa.
Oyagala okuteeka ekkubo eririko kati nga amaka ga tabu eno?
Eteeka langi enkulu etali ya bulijjo ku ntandikwa
Eteekawo langi y\'akabonero akatakyukakyuka. Tekyusa langi ya kabonero ka dayirekita.
Ku kyuma ekiriko emirandira kyokka. Kikebere singa oba okakasa ku kyo.
Omuwendo gw\'ennyiriri mu kulaba kwa giridi
Enkyukakyuka zijja kubaawo oluvannyuma lw\'okuddamu okutandika app
Laga Ebifaananyi ebitonotono ebya apps n’ebifaananyi
Laga olunaku n’essaawa gye byasembayo okukyusibwa
Laga Olunaku Lwasembyeyo Okukyusibwa ne Ebiseera
Laga obunene bwa fayiro n\'omuwendo gw\'ebintu mu folda
Laga Olukusa lwa Fayiro ne Folda
Olina enkyukakyuka ezitaterekeddwa, oyagala okuzitereka nga tonnafuluma?
Kino kiterekeddwa. Kikolwa ki kye wandyagadde okukola?
Kino kiteeka package. Kikolwa ki kye wandyagadde okukola?
Kozesa obubonero obwekulungirivu ku bifaananyi ne vidiyo
Esobozesa okutambulira emabega mu ngeri ey\'enjawulo waggulu ku lukalala
Eno app ya nkola, okugisazaamu kiyinza okuvaako enkola obutabeera nnywevu.\ nMugende mu maaso?
Fayiro z\'okutereka zijja kuggyibwa mu folda eno. Omuwendo ogusookerwako gwe dayirekita omuli archive.
Bw\'oba otandika, ekitabo ekisembyeyo okulabibwa ku buli tabu kijja kulagibwa
Oba oba nedda system navigation bar eriko langi n\'olususu
Teeka langi ku bitundu bya UI eby\'enjawulo
Teeka langi ku bintu ebinene ebya UI ku tabu ya kkono
Teeka langi ku FAB ne UI endala entono elements
App yeetaaga olukusa lw\'okutereka okugenda mu maaso. Okusazaamu akasengejja kano kijja kufuluma mu app.
Noonya ng\'okozesa ekigambo ekya bulijjo eky\'omulembe gwa BASH
Singa kiteekebwawo, ekigambo ekya bulijjo kijja kukwatagana n\'erinnya lya fayiro lyonna, ejja kunoonya okubeerawo mu ngeri endala.
Teeka langi ku bintu ebinene ebya UI ku tabu entuufu
Loopa ebizibu oba saba ekintu ekipya

Engeri y'okuyingira mu folda ya Windows egabanyizibwa ku Android (SMB)


Ssobozesa Okugabana Fayiro ku Windows

Ggulawo Control Panel, nyweza Londa HomeGroup ne Sharing options wansi wa Network ne Intaneeti, n'onyiga "Change Advanced Sharing Settings," sobozesa "Fayiro ne... Ekintu eky'okugabana ku Printer".


Enteekateeka endala ez'okugabana Fayiro

Oyinza n'okwagala okutegeka ensengeka endala ez'okugabana ez'omulembe wano. 
 Okugeza, oyinza okusobozesa okuyingira mu fayiro zo nga tolina kigambo kya kuyita singa oba weesiga zonna ebyuma ebiri ku mutimbagano gwo ogw’omu kitundu. Oluvannyuma lw'okugabana fayiro ne printa okusobozesa, osobola ggulawo File Explorer oba Windows Explorer, koona ku ddyo ku folda gy’oyagala okugabana, era londa Ebintu. 
 Nywa ku bbaatuuni Gabana era okole ekitabo okubeera ku mutimbagano.


Kakasa nti ebyuma byombi biri ku Wifi emu

Ekintu kino kifuula fayiro okubeera ku mutimbagano gw’omu kitundu, kale PC yo n’ebyuma by’oku ssimu balina okuba ku mutimbagano gwe gumu ogw’omu kitundu. Tosobola kuyingira mu folda ya Windows egabanyizibwa ku yintaneeti oba nga ssimu yo ey’omu ngalo eyungibwa ku data yaayo ey’oku ssimu — it erina okuyungibwa ku Wi-Fi.


Funa Endagiriro ya IP

Ggulawo Ekiragiro Ekiragiro. Wandiika 'ipconfig' n'onyiga Enter. Noonya Omulyango ogusookerwako wansi wa network adapter yo ku router's IP address yo. Noonya \"IPv4 Address\" wansi w\" wansi w'ekitundu kya adapter kyekimu okuzuula IP ya kompyuta yo endagiriro.


Yingiza ebikwata ku nsonga mu kasengejja ka SMB
Ojja kwetaaga okukoppa fayiro eno mu tterekero okugiggulawo
Ekkubo erigenda mu kikolo kya dayirekita okugabana
kweka ebbaala y’ebikozesebwa mu ngeri ey’otoma ng’ogenda
Okukola kulemereddwa ku fayiro zino wammanga
Teeka ekigambo ekikulu eky\'okusiba. Leka nga njereere okuggyawo.
Be amagezi, nga okyusa enkola yo ey\'obukuumi okuva Ensengeka z\'enkola, tojja kusobola kusumulula birimu bino.
Kuba ku sensa okugenda mu maaso
Amaze Cloud plugin tezuuliddwa. Nsaba owanule okuva ku Play Store.
Eremereddwa okutikka omukutu. Nsaba oggulewo Amaze Cloud omulundi gumu.
Oguweddewo memory, nsaba olongoose RAM ezimu
Ensobi mu kufuna endagiriro ya inet ey\'omu kitundu
Nywa ebbaala y’ekkubo eddene okuwandiika ekkubo ery’enjawulo
Ekusobozesa okuggulawo fayiro mu mirimu egy\'enjawulo. Zifune okuva ku screen ya system recents.
Nsaba oteekewo app ya Bitcoin Wallet
Amaze Fayiro Manager FTP Server\'s Notifications
Eremereddwa okutikka fayiro. Nsaba okebere omukago gwo.

Obutuufu bwa host '%1$s' tebusobola kuteekebwawo.

%2$s key fingerprint ye %3$s.

Nsaba koona ku "Yee" okukakasa ebikukwatako; bwe kitaba ekyo, nsaba koona ku "Nedda".
Okulemererwa okuyingira: Tekisoboka kukakasa n\'erinnya ly\'omukozesa n\'ekigambo ky\'okuyita ekiweereddwa.
Okulemererwa okuyingira: Tekisoboka kukakasa n\'erinnya ly\'omukozesa n\'ekisumuluzo eky\'ekyama ekiweereddwa.

KIsoboka NTI OMUNTU AKOZESA EKINTU EKIBI!

Omuntu ayinza okuba ng'akuwuliriza mu kiseera kino (okulumba omusajja-mu-makkati)! Era kisoboka okuba nti ekisumuluzo ky'omugenyi kyakakyusibwa. Engalo y'ekisumuluzo eky'olukale esindikiddwa omukozi ow'ewala tekwatagana n'eyo eterekeddwa mu Amaze.

Nsaba otuukirire omuddukanya enkola yo oba teekawo omukago omupya okugenda mu maaso n'okuyungibwa ku seva.
Okutonda amakubo amampi tekiwagirwa mutongozi wo.
Kiba kirungi okukozesa \".zip\" nga ekyongereza fayiro.
Omuddukanya fayiro y`okukola ebintu ku Android
Kirungi okukozesa \".txt\" ng\" nga fayiro eyongereza.
Tewali decoder ntuufu okuggya ensirifu ya PEM.
Eremereddwa okulongoosa okuyingira kw\'okusiba mu database
Tewali info yonna ku fayiro eno
Can\'t, nsaba oggulewo okuva ku app esembayo
The fayiro mpanvu nnyo era tesobola kulongoosebwa, wabula osobola okusoma ennukuta za %d ezisooka

AESCrypt ye nkola y\'okusiba fayiro ey\'ensibuko enzigule eyesigamiziddwa ku kusiba kwa AES. Era etambuzibwa, esobola okuggyibwamu ensirifu ne pulogulaamu za AESCrypt ku mikutu emirala.

Omukutu gwa AESCrypt

nga bwe kiri

Amaze\'s Encryption Format nayo yeesigamiziddwa ku kusiba kwa AES; naye eyawukana ku nkola ya AESCrypt, esobola okuggyibwamu ensirifu ekyuma kino kyokka; era tolina kuggya Amaze File Manager ku kyuma kino wadde okukyusa engeri gy\'osiba screen, bwe kitaba ekyo tojja kuba na ngeri yonna gy\'oyinza kuzzaawo fayiro ensirifu.
Fayiro ezisibiddwa zirina okukozesa \".aze\" ng\'ekyongerwako kya fayiro.
Fayiro ezisibiddwa zirina okukozesa \".aes\" ng\'ekyongerwako kya fayiro.
Fayiro ekoleddwa ejja kukwekebwa mu lukalala lwa fayiro.
App yeetaaga olukusa okuteeka apps zigenda mu maaso.
Fayiro ezimu mu tterekero teziyinza kuggyibwamu; archive eyinza okwonooneka oba nga yava mu nsibuko embi.
Kati ojja kugenda ku nkola ya fayiro ya Android olw\'ensonga z\'ebyokwerinda. Nsaba olonde ekyuma kya USB okuva ku lukalala oluli ku kkono.
Mwebale kuwaayo, kino kitukuuma nga tuli banyiikivu! (:
Ssobozesa marquee effect ku mannya ga fayiro
Tekisoboka open archive \"%s\".Oba tetusobola kuggulawo archive, oba archive eyonoonese.

KIsoboka NTI OMUNTU AKOZESA EKINTU EKIBI!

Omuntu ayinza okuba ng'akuwuliriza mu kiseera kino (okulumba omuntu mu makkati)!Era kisoboka okuba nti ekisumuluzo ky'omugenyi kyakakyusibwa.Ekifaananyi ky'engalo kubanga ekisumuluzo eky'olukale ekiweerezeddwa omukozi ow'ewala tekikwatagana n'ekyo ekiterekeddwa mu Amaze.

Oyinza okugenda mu maaso n'okulongoosa engalo z'omugenyi oba okusazaamu okulongoosa ensengeka z'omukago gwa SSH.
Fayiro ezimu zalemererwa olw\'obutali ntuufu okukola
Yungibwa ku mutimbagano oba sobozesa AP
Tegeeza ensobi eno ng\'oyita ku e-mail
Teega ensobi eno ng\'oyita ku telegram
Nsaba okebere oba ensonga eteesa ku kabenje kwo yaliwo dda.
Lemesa okukebera okussa omukono ku IPC (Ku seeva za SMBv1 ez\'edda - UNSAFE!)
Erongoosa enkola z\'okuggulawo fayiro ezisookerwako ezirondeddwa
Bwe kiba kisobozeseddwa, ekozesa enkola ey\'edda okuwandiika fayiro
RAR archive \"%s\" is un supported RAR v5 archive.
Ojja kwetaaga okuddamu okutandika seva ya FTP enkyukakyuka okutandika okukola.
Tekisobola kuggya kuyingira mu tterekero \"%s\" okutuuka ku \"%s\".
Kuba n\'okusika okutambuza oba okukoppa fayiro
Kwa okuyingira kwa SAF ku seva ya FTP

Okuva bwe kiri nti eno ye run yo esoose eya FTP server, era nga okozesa ekyuma\'s internal storage nga shared folder, nsaba okkirize Amaze okuyingira mu storage nga okozesa SAF.\n\n
Kino olina okukikola omulundi gumu gwokka, okutuusa omulundi oguddako lw\'olonda ekifo ekipya eky\'okugabana.

Okuva ku Android 10, Android yali etaddewo obukwakkulizo ku dayirekita ezimu, era zeetaaga okuyingira ne Storage Access Framework.\n \nNkusaba okkirize Amaze okuyingira mu dayirekita okuva ku muddukanya fayiro y\'enkola ng\'onyiga ku \"Kiriza Okuyingira\".
Enable kino olw’obuwagizi bw’okukozesa okutereka okw’ebweru w’ekyuma ku nkyusa za Android empya

Ekkubo eryagabana seva ya FTP lyali lizzeemu okuteekebwa mu kutereka okw’omunda nga bw’okyusa okudda ku kussa mu nkola enkola ya fayiro ey’edda. Nkusaba olonde ekkubo eppya ng\'okozesa menu eri waggulu ku ddyo nga bwe kyetaagisa.
Ekkubo erya FTP server shared path lyali lizzeemu okuteekebwa mu kutereka okw\'omunda
Olonda ekkubo eryetaaga okuyingira mu kikolo. Nsaba osobozesa root explorer mu nsengeka singa ekyuma kyo kiba kikoola.

Olonda ekkubo eryetaaga okuyingira mu kikolo, erisobozesa emirimu gy\'okusoma/okuwandiika mu nkola ya fayiro yonna ku kyuma kyo, era kya bulabe - ensobi ezitafaayo ziyinza okuziba ekyuma kyo!\n\nOkakasa?
\"%s\" ye tterekero eyonoonese.\nObubaka okuva mu extractor: \"%s\"
Fayiro tesobola kuggulwawo nga okozesa app eno
Tonda omukutu gwa Google DriveTM ogw’okuddukanya fayiro okuva munda mu Amaze File Manager.
Ensobi mu kuleeta olukalala lw’ebintu okuva ku Google Play.

Okuva ku Android 11 , Google esaba Abaddukanya Fayiro okusaba olukusa lw’omukozesa okuddukanya fayiro zonna ku kyuma. Ebisingawo wano. 

Amaze File Manager naye yeetaaga olukusa luno. Oluvannyuma lw'okunyiga "Grant"wano, nsaba londa Allow access to manage all files option ku screen eddako. 

Okusazaamu akasengejja kano kijja kufuluma mu pulogulaamu.
Teeka omulamwa, langi n\'endabika y\'omuddukanya fayiro
Fuga amawulire ki g\'olina okulaga, okulongoosa ebbaala y\'oku mabbali, n\'okukyusakyusa mu by\'okwettanira UI
Kyusa enneeyisa nga okunoonya okw\'omulembe n\'okumanya oba okuggulawo fayiro ng\'omulimu omupya
Fayiro gye buvuddeko yayingizibwa okuyita mu Amaze
Teyasobodde kufuna ngeri ya kuggulawo fayiro

Ogenda kukyusibwa okudda mu Amaze File Utilities. It\'s our open source app that has inbuilt audio/video/image/document viewers, ekusobozesa okwekenneenya fayiro ezitali nnungi okusumulula okutereka, okutambuza amangu nga okozesa Wifi P2P n\'ebirala bingi.\nNsaba otuwagire nga ogezaako.
Mwebale kuteeka Amaze File Utilities. You\'re being redirected to the app.
Gabana ebiwandiiko ebikwatiddwa ng’oyita ku email / telegram

Oli kakasa nti oyagala kuggulawo fayiro eno wammanga?

Erinnya:
%s

Ekifo:
%s

Size:
%s

MD5:
%s

SHA256:\ n%s
Okugoberera enkola ya Google Play, apps tezikkirizibwa kwetereeza ku bwazo. Nsaba okulongoosa app okuva ku Google Play.
Tekisoboka kufuna bikwata ku package okuva mu fayiro \"%s\". Oba fayiro eragiddwa si APK, oba fayiro ya package eyonoonese.
Saba okukakasa nga tonnasazaamu fayiro. Okulemesa kino kimalamu nnyo amaanyi!
Okufulumya kulemereddwa: tekusobodde kuwandiika fayiro ya backup
Okuyingiza kulemereddwa: tekusobodde kusoma backup fayiro
Amaze Cloud Plugin tewagirwa na nkyusa ya F-Droid.Nsaba okozese enkyusa ya Play Store eya Amaze.
Elemesa Amaze inbuilt media players okuva mu file chooser
Tewali app ezuuliddwa kukwata kigendererwa kino.Olina DocumentsUI etekeddwako?
Ebyembi, tetwasobola kukyusa biwandiiko byo eby\'okuyunga ekire ku schema empya eya database, era twalina okuziggya mu app.Nsaba oddemu okukola omukago gw\'ekire.
